    • get

      public static OpeningGameEvaluator get()
      Returns the singleton instance of OpeningGameEvaluator.
      Returns:
      The instance of OpeningGameEvaluator.

    • evaluate

      public double evaluate(Board board, int depth)
      Evaluates the given board from the perspective of a player and returns a score.
      Specified by:
      evaluate in interface BoardEvaluator
      Parameters:
      board - The current state of the chess board.
      depth - The search depth in the AI's thinking process.
      Returns:
      The evaluation score of the board.

    • score

      private double score(Player player, Board board, int depth)
      Calculates the overall score of the current board position for a given player focusing specifically on opening principles.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the board position is being evaluated.
      board - The current state of the chess board.
      depth - The current search depth (higher depths may use different weights)
      Returns:
      The evaluation score of the board from the perspective of the specified player.

    • materialScore

      private double materialScore(Collection<Piece> playerPieces)
      Evaluates material with lower weight during opening. Some material sacrifices are common in openings for initiative.

    • developmentScore

      private double developmentScore(Player player, Board board)
      Evaluates development of pieces - a critical opening consideration.
